/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the street below. The street is lined with lush green trees and shrubs, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene. In the distance, buildings rise, their details softened by the distance. The image is taken from a low angle, making the viewer feel as if they are standing right there on the street, looking up at the buildings and the sky. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees and shrubs contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky. The image is a beautiful representation of the blend of nature and urban life in Beijing.
